description: Situated in the northern wine-producing area of Trento, this trattoria is a real highlight, thanks to its delicious, beautifully presented cuisine which is always full of flavour. The menu includes regional dishes as well as more modern specialities (plus a few fish-based options) which can be enjoyed either in the typical dining room or out on the veranda (also open in winter) with its stunning views of the Adige valley.
